description: The Chocolate Hills are a geological formation in the Bohol province of the Philippines. There are at least 1,260 hills but there may be as many as 1,776 hills spread over an area of more than 50 square kilometers. They are covered in green grass that turns brown (like chocolate) during the dry season, hence the name.
Experience the epitome of luxury in our Executive Suite. With a separate living area, plush furnishings, and premium amenities, this suite offers unparalleled comfort and style.
cost: Varies widely, approximately 30,000 to 45,000 USD for a guided climb
